section.title: tax types master list of Tax Types
section.para: Tax types provide a system for classifying goods and services into taxable categories. The primary implementation of tax types is on the Item master, where items may be linked to tax types. For example, if you have a tax type called "Taxable," you would want to associate this tax type with all your taxable items. The tax type makes up one third of the three-way match on tax assignments, which includes tax zone, tax code, and tax type. When all three of these match for a particular order, then tax will be calculated appropriately.

note.para: If you need to calculate tax on freight, make sure that your tax assignment matrix includes a match using the system-defined Freight tax type.
